name: Skull Destroyer
description:
My second game made for the Secret Santa Jam. Made in a few days, it is my second game. :D

The aim of the game is to defend your island from invading skulls that are being summoned in! See how long you can last against the endless waves.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Aim

MouseButton - Shoot a Fireball!

Music from here
